## Checklist

### General
- [ ] I have read the [CONTRIBUTING.md](../CONTRIBUTING.md) guidelines
- [ ] I have followed the [Package Guidelines](../docs/PACKAGE_GUIDELINES.md)
- [ ] My package name follows the naming conventions
- [ ] I have placed the package in the appropriate category

### Package Files
- [ ] PKGINFO file is complete and correct
- [ ] build.sh script is executable and functional
- [ ] README.md is complete with usage instructions
- [ ] All required fields in PKGINFO are filled
- [ ] License information is accurate

### Testing
- [ ] I have tested the build script successfully
- [ ] The package builds without errors
- [ ] The installed application runs correctly
- [ ] All dependencies are listed in PKGINFO
- [ ] Checksums are provided (or marked as SKIP with justification)

### Documentation
- [ ] Package README includes installation instructions
- [ ] Package README includes usage examples
- [ ] Dependencies are documented
- [ ] Known issues are documented (if any)

### Security (if applicable)
- [ ] Sources are downloaded from official/trusted locations
- [ ] HTTPS URLs are used where possible
- [ ] Source checksums are verified
- [ ] No known security vulnerabilities
